[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646128653542{padding-top: 160px !important;background-color: #2f529e !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-150px“}”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”33788″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1646635224759{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]

Digital Marketing Course In Indiranagar, Bengaluru

Digiperform Offers Best Digital Marketing Training in Indiranagar, Bengaluru. Aimed For Freshers, Working Professional, & Business Owners with Latest Curriculum, 100% Practical Exposure and Live-Assignments.

321+ Hours Program 50+ Digital Marketing Modules 15+ Specialized Certificates

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”] BOOK A FREE DEMO[vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″]
100% Job Assistance Award Winning LMS Tool based learning
DOWNLOAD BROCHURE NOW

Trained more than 30,000+ Students

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646125027684{margin-bottom: -60px !important;padding-top: 110px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
    Awarded as Asia’s Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education

    About: Digital Marketing
    Institute In Indiranagar, Bengaluru

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646125373661{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

    Anyone can join our Live-Classroom Training in Indiranagar, Bengaluru to enhance their digital marketing skills by getting one of the most valuable certifications in the industry for a better career and job opportunities.

    Our Institute Offers State-of-the-art Digital Marketing Classrooms with modern furniture, Learning aids and combined capacity to train 70 Students at a time. Leading Trainers of the region will be delivering live lectures to you, Followed by Hands-on Practicals and home assignment.

    [vc_empty_space height=”5px”] DOWNLOAD BROCHURE[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”20″ t_2_is_gradient=”true” t_2_color=”#e6f3f7″ t_3_is_gradient=”true” t_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” t_3_color_2=”#f7f7f7″ css=”.vc_custom_1646128570120{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“80px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646723675700{margin-top: 180px !important;}”][vc_column]

    The Advanced Digital Marketing Training Program in Indiranagar, Bengaluru is Best

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646129529161{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”]

    Who can join Digital Marketing Course?

    The training program specially designed to help you acquire the skills required for building an amazing career in the Digital Marketing Domain. Evolution needs freedom… Right? Through this center, we offer the best Digital Marketing Course in Indiranagar, Bengaluru that will provide you with a lot of opportunities to learn, to craft & explore your own strategies.

    [vc_column_text]

    • Jobseeker looking for a bright career option.
    • Graduates who are looking for their first job.
    • Professionals who want to enhance their skills.
    • Professionals looking for a Career Change.
    • Small Business Owners who don’t want to stay small.
    • Entrepreneurs who desire to be more entrepreneurial.
    • Gain a Professional Certification in Digital Marketing.

    [/vc_column_text] YES! BOOK MY FREE DEMO[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”33713″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1646130241326{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646131552582{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

    Trusted by over 100+ of the World’s Leading Companies

    13,300+ Students Got their 1st Job; With Digiperform Certifications & Over 9000+ Trainees Got Better Salary Hike.

    [vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33718″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”33715″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33720″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”33733″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33719″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”33717″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646131624567{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

    Digiperform Reviews: What our Trainees Say about Us?

    Our Courses have Been Receiving an average rating of 9.4/10 from our course participants. Till date, Digiperform has trained more than 30,000+ individuals.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” pix_visibility=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1646133134777{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H3vgxrm1DWw” align=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sk3r2AYgBRc” align=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column content_align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″]
    SEND ME A BROCHURE
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646645606539{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column]

    Curriculum: Digital Marketing Course in Indiranagar, Bengaluru

    The training program is suitable for everyone, whether a Job Seeker, Entrepreneur, Working Professional or Business Owner.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
    Section 1: Marketing & Web Presence Foundation Modules (5 Modules)
    Section 2: Online Business Visibility Creation (6 Modules)
    SECTION 3: Lead Generation (5 Modules)
    SECTION 4: Lead Nurturing (4 Modules)
    SECTION 5: Personal Branding & Online Earning (4 Modules)
    SECTION 6: Interview Preparation (1 Modules )
    [vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646035855637{margin-top: -25px !important;}”]

    Module 1: Marketing Foundation
    • History of Marketing
    • Traditional vs. Digital Marketing
    Module 2: Digital Marketing Ecosystem
    • The Current Opportunity
    • Digital Marketing Channels, Career & Consumer Journey
    Module 3: Digital Visibility Strategy
    • Website Planning
    • Local Visibility
    • Social Media Visibility
    Module 4: Online Lead Strategy
    • Need of Online Advertising & Types
    • Media Buying Principles
    • Nurturing & Lead Funnels
    Live-Tools Walkthrough: Google Forms, Survey Monkey, Google Drive, Google Advanced Search

    [/vc_column_text]

    [vc_column_text]

    Learn how to make a business & its products more visible to online prospects
    Module 6: Graphic Designing For Business
    • Graphic Design Fundamentals
    • Designing- Marketing Kits
    • Designing Online Documents
    Module 7: Video Marketing For Business
    • Video Creation Strategy
    • Importance of Video Marketing
    • Types of Online Videos
    • Building Explainer Video Scripts
    • Live Exercise: Creating Explainer Videos
    • YouTube Marketing
    • Customizing Youtube Channel
    • Youtube Profile & Post Best Practices
    • Live Exercise: Youtube Customization & Upload
    Module 8: Building Your Business Website
    • Buying Domain & Hosting
    • Understanding C-panel
    • Installing WordPress
    • Customizing Theme
    • Building Home Page & Blog
    • Adding One Squeeze Page
    • Customizing Menu
    • Customization Practice & Doubt Session
    Module 9: Social Media Optimization For Business
    • Social Media Introduction
    • Exploring Different Social Media Networks
    • Optimizing Your Facebook Pages For Business
    • Optimizing Businesses Presence on Twitter
    • Linkedin Profile Optimization
    • Instagram Marketing
    Module 10: Search Engine Optimization
    • What is SEO
    • Keyword Selection & Mapping
    • Content Optimization
    • On-Page SEO & HTML Tag Optimization
    • Off-Page SEO & Link Building
    • Local SEO
    Module 11: Web Analytics & Traffic Reporting
    • Setting Up Google Analytics
    • Overview of Key GA Reports from Existing Data
    • Other Analytic Tools
    • Live Exercise: Analytics Report Audit
    Live-Tools Walkthrough:
    Canva, Youtube, Raw Shorts, Biteable, WordPress, SEO Power Suite, SEMRush, Facebook, Google Trends, LinkedIn Ads, Instagram

    [/vc_column_text]

    [vc_column_text]

    Module 12: Landing Page Optimization
    • Anatomy of Landing Page
    • Strategizing Landing Page-Live
    Module 13: Online Advertising & Google Ads
    • Introduction to Paid Marketing
    • Programmatic & Direct Ads
    • Introduction to Search Ads
    • Google Ads Search (PPC) Advertising
    • Search Campaign Best Practices
    Module 14: Display Advertising
    • Introduction to Display Advertising
    • Live Display Campaign Creation Overview
    Module 15: Video Advertising
    • Introduction to Video Advertising
    • Video Ad Campaign-Live Walkthrough
    Module 16: Facebook Advertising
    • Introduction to FB Ads- Lead Generation, Engagement, Website Visits Etc.
    • FB Ad Campaign Creation-Live Walkthrough
    • FB Ads Best Practices
    Live-Tools Walkthrough:
    Google Ads, Facebook Ads

    [/vc_column_text]

    [vc_column_text]

    Module 17: Email Marketing
    • Importance of email marketing
    • How to write effective mails
    • Email Strategy Creation
    • Email Marketing Tool
    • Email reporting & analysis
    Module 18: Remarketing & Rebranding
    • Cookie vs Data-Based Remarketing
    • Setting Up Remarketing Pixel
    • Display Remarketing Campaign-Live Walkthrough
    • Search Remarketing Campaign-Live Walkthrough
    Module 19: Inbound Marketing
    • What is Inbound Marketing
    • How to Generate Content Ideas
    • Building Content Calendars
    • Content Repurposing
    Module 20: Web Content Writing
    • Content Writing Essentials & Tools
    • Content Writing For Business Websites
    • Content Writing For Ecommerce Websites
    • Copywriting vs. Content Writing
    Live-Tools Walkthrough:
    Mailchimp, Leadsquared, Google Remarketing, Facebook Remarketing

    [/vc_column_text]

    [vc_column_text]

    Module 21: E-commerce & Marketplace Marketing
    • E-commerce on Social Media Platforms
    • Setting Up Your E-commerce Store
    • Selling on Marketplaces
    • E-commerce Store Marketing
    Module 22: Personal Branding & Influencer Marketing
    • What is Personal Branding & Influencer Marketing
    • Key Personal Branding Platforms
    • Personal Branding 60 Days Roadmap
    • Making Money with Digital Products
    Module 23: Affiliate Marketing & Google Adsense
    • Introduction to Online Money Making
    • Introduction to Affiliate Networks & Payment Models
    • Signing up for Affiliate Programs
    • Selecting an Offer
    • Earning With Google Adsense
    Module 24: Earning As A Digital Marketing Freelancer
    • Freelancing Platforms
    • Building Freelancing Profile
    • Live Walkthrough: How to Grab Projects
    • How to Price your Services

    [/vc_column_text]

    [vc_column_text]Get yourself prepared to apply for digital marketing jobs

    Module 25: Interview Process & Preparation

      • Placement Process Introduction
      • Understanding your Career Path
      • Ensuring your Skill Proficiency
      • How a Great CV Looks Like
      • Live Exercise: Creating Customized Cover Letters
      • Mock Interviews

    [/vc_column_text]

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646137410877{margin-top: 80px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

    Why Digiperform is Leader in Digital Marketing Training?

    Digiperform is Asia’s Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/4″]

    0+

    BATCHES

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

    0

    CENTERS

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

    0+

    TRAINED

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

    0+

    PLACEMENTS

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646050705150{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

    100% Placement Assistance by Digiperform

    Our Placement cell is divided into Head Office and Zonal Teams to ensure we are able to find and offer region wise job and internship opportunities for candidates.

    We have a team of enthusiastic members, responsible for interfacing with the organization and assisting thousands of students in securing the best placements.

    [vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1590013670502{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ content_align=”text-center”]
    IN-COURSE INTERNSHIP
    Paid internships to learn from professionals and gain meaningful, hands-on experience.
    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
    MOCK INTERVIEW
    Mock interview sessions from experts to help you prepared for the final interview.
    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
    CAMPUS DRIVE
    Campus Drive Placements by partnering with the 1200+ hiring partners across the nation.
    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1590013670502{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ content_align=”text-center”]
    LMS JOBS
    In-house feature to apply for jobs and start a career with your first Digital Marketing job.
    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
    RESUME BUILDING
    Complete guidance to build your professional resume to catch the attention of recruiters.
    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
    LIVE PRACTICAL SESSIONS
    Digiperform provides live training sessions and helps students to understand the concepts.
    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1646051126693{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-20px“}”][vc_column]

    FAQ: Digital Marketing Course

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645779982233{padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”]
    [vc_column_text]India is world’s 2nd biggest internet population and there will be atleast 1 internet related job created for every 10 users, Also as per Govt. of India and Mckinsey joint report India will be $1 Trillion Digital economy by 2025. About 60% of 5 Crore SME’s will get digital in the next few years and at least 60 Million Jobs will be created to support the digital economy by 2025.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]For the “Blue Programs” you are expected to be aware of Basic Communications and Internet Skills. There is no as such minimum education criterion. These courses are preferred by Job Seekers, Working Professionals, Housewives and Business Owners looking to acquire quick Digital Skills.
    However, “Orange Programs” are strictly based on your formal education level. Only 10+2 qualified students are allowed for annual program and for PG program, A graduation is a must.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]The candidate must possess basic computer and internet literary skills to efficiently take this program.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]This course has a combined curriculum of 320 hours which involves about 120 hours of classroom training and rest of the hours dedicated towards mandatory assignments, doubt sessions, self study and examinations. For Weekday batches have a Span of about 2 months and weekend 3-4 months.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]Digiperform Certification Training is offered at our “Authorised Learning Centres” across India. You can visit the one near you or contact them online to find batch details and join.[/vc_column_text]
    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
    [vc_column_text]Digiperform is the leader in Digital Marketing Training and Only company that’s awarded in 3 Asian countries ( India, Thailand & Singapore) for the quality of curriculum and technology with 40+ Centres and 20,000+ Alumni. You will choose a certification that is needed & appreciated by recruiters in the industry. We are also the First Organisation to launch the Annual Certificate Program in Digital Marketing after 10+2 Level in India.
    Being an HT Media Partner Company, Digiperform is already a trusted Company in Media and Marketing Industry.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]Our courses offer 100% Placement/Internship Support to students who maintain above 85% attendance and participation in all placements related activities after clearing all examinations.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]Yes, Being a Digital Marketer you will need a laptop or PC. In fact system and internet are 2 main essentials of this program. This program will enable you to earn through these two things once you successfully complete it.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]In all our programs we extensively use industry tools & software, case studies, live advertising budget, real-world problem-solving approach to ensure that you are able to get true hands-on experience.[/vc_column_text]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” bottom_divider_select=”8″ b_has_animation=”true” b_2_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.01)” b_3_is_gradient=”true” b_3_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.08)” b_3_color_2=”rgba(255,255,255,0.01)” b_3_animation=”fade-in-up” top_divider_select=”8″ t_has_animation=”true” t_1_color=”rgba(152,214,98,0.01)” t_2_color=”” t_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” t_3_animation=”fade-in-down” t_flip_h=”true” pix_overlay_color=”gray-1″ responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_pt“:“20“,“pix_res_sm_pb“:“20“,“pix_res_md_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pb“:“40“}” css=”.vc_custom_1613618080432{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}” t_custom_height=”200px” b_custom_height=”300px” pix_overlay_opacity=”1″ b_3_delay=”300″ t_3_delay=”150″][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_sm_pb“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pb“:“40“}” css=”.vc_custom_1613618221329{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1613618065669{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”]
    Contact us today

    2nd Floor, 483, 100 FT Road, Indiranagar, Landmark: KFC Signal, Above Dr. Batra, Bengaluru 560038

    +91 6366-528-650

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
    [vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_” css=”.vc_custom_1647943670622{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
